name: Intensive Serbian/Croatian I
description: Not open to native or heritage speakers of Serbian/Croatian. Emphasis on developing oral proficiency in Serbian/Croatian using intensive methods of instruction. Six lecture hours a week for one semester. Serbian/Croatian 601C and 506 may not both be counted. Serbian/Croatian 601C and 507 may not both be counted.

name: First-Year Serbian/Croatian I
description: Emphasis on proficiency in four skills: listening, speaking, reading, and writing. Five lecture hours a week for one semester. Serbian/Croatian 601C and 506 may not both be counted.

name: First-Year Serbian/Croatian II
description: Emphasis on proficiency in four skills: listening, speaking, reading, and writing. Five lecture hours a week for one semester. Serbian/Croatian 601C and 507 may not both be counted. Prerequisite: Serbian/Croatian 506.

name: Intensive Serbian/Croatian II
description: Not open to native or heritage speakers of Serbian/Croatian. Continuing intensive development of proficiency in Serbian/Croatian, with a focus on speaking and the reading of authentic texts. Six lecture hours a week for one semester. Serbian/Croatian 611C and 312K may not both be counted. Serbian/Croatian 611C and 312L may not both be counted. Prerequisite: Serbian/Croatian 601C or 507.

name: Second-Year Serbian/Croatian I
description: Listening, speaking, reading, and writing at the second-year level. Three lecture hours a week for one semester. Serbian/Croatian 611C and 312K may not both be counted. Prerequisite: Serbian/Croatian 601C or 507.

name: Second-Year Serbian/Croatian II
description: Listening, speaking, reading, and writing at the advanced, second-year level. Three lecture hours a week for one semester. Serbian/Croatian 611C and 312L may not both be counted. Prerequisite: Serbian/Croatian 312K.

name: Topics in Serbian/Croatian Studies
description: Selected aspects of Serbian/Croatian history and culture. Conducted in English. Three lecture hours a week for one semester.  May be repeated for credit when the topics vary. Prerequisite: Varies with the topic.

name: Third-Year Serbian/Croatian I
description: Oral expression, reading, and composition. Three lecture hours a week for one semester. Prerequisite: Serbian/Croatian 611C or 312L.

name: Third-Year Serbian/Croatian II
description: Oral expression, reading, and composition. Three lecture hours a week for one semester. Prerequisite: Serbian/Croatian 325.

name: Conference Course in Serbian/Croatian
description: Conference course.  May be repeated for credit. Prerequisite: Serbian/Croatian 312K and 312L and consent of instructor.
